movies.Title: Avatar
movies.Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movies.Actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

movies.Title: Moana
movies.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
movies.Director: Ron Clements, John Musker, Don Hall
movies.Actors: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House

movies.Title: Transformers
movies.Plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.
movies.Actors: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel

movies.Title: The Avengers
movies.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

movies.Title: The Devil Wears Prada
movies.Plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.
movies.Actors: Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep, Adrian Grenier

movies.Title: John Wick
movies.Plot: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters who killed his dog and stole his car.
movies.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen

movies.Title: Titanic
movies.Plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane

movies.Title: Source Code
movies.Plot: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.
movies.Actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga
